thread.title: The Oscar for best picture goes to...wait a minute, NOT 'La La Land' - CNET
thread.title_full: The Oscar for best picture goes to...wait a minute, NOT 'La La Land' - CNET

author: Gael Fashingbauer Cooper
title: The Oscar for best picture goes to...wait a minute, NOT 'La La Land' - CNET
text:
Español The Oscar for best picture goes to...wait a minute, NOT 'La La Land' In a shocking turn of events, "Moonlight" turns out to be the real best picture winner after "La La Land" gets announced as the victor. @gaelFC 
The Academy Awards were almost over Sunday night when the biggest goof-up that possibly could happen happened. 
Actors Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway apparently were given the wrong card to read for the best picture winner, sending the cast and crew of " La La Land " onstage to make speeches before realizing the actual winner was " Moonlight. " 
Once the mistake was realized, Beatty showed the audience the card he and Dunaway were given stating that Emma Stone was the winner for "La La Land." Stone had won just earlier for best actress, and it seemed her name card also made it into the best picture envelope. 
Needless to say, the mixup shocked viewers and social media mavens alike. 
Not everyone was buying it. 
Of course, election references started flying. 
I t's Complicated : This is dating in the age of apps. Having fun yet? These stories get to the heart of the matter. 
Batteries Not Included : The CNET team reminds us why tech is cool. Share your voice
